messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 16 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, and Reza. Wim is connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva. Raj is connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei. Jing is also connected to Amir, Wim, Raj, and Pam. Wei is connected to Nisha, Reza, Kim, and Raj. Nisha is connected to Wei, Reza, Kim, and Sara. Reza is connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei. Kim is also connected to Wei, Nisha, Reza, and Moin. Ian is connected to Moin, Puja, Sara, and Matt. Moin is connected to Ian, Puja, Kim, and Sara. Puja is connected to Pari, Ian, Sara, and Moin. Sara is also connected to Ian, Moin, Puja, and Nisha. Pari is connected to Pam, Matt, Eva, and Puja. Pam is connected to Jing, Pari, Matt, and Eva. Matt is connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian. Eva is also connected to Pari, Pam, Matt, and Wim. From Kim what is the shortest path to Nisha? Starting from Kim, please list the scholar numbers in order, including Kim, separated by commas.

user: How many lines in the image above are connected? There are two connected lines in the image. Please count the number of connected lines in the image.

user: How many different paths can be formed between two circles, where each line is not longer than 3? There are two different paths in the image. Please list the number of different paths in the image.

user: Which circles are connected? There are two circles in the image. Please show the number of connected circles in the image.

user: Which two circles are connected? There are two circles in the image. Please show the number
